word: A SPECIAL RESURRECTION BEFORE JESUS APPEARS.\97Graves are opened, and \93many of them that sleep in the dust of the earth . . . awake, some to everlasting life, and some to shame and everlasting contempt.\94 Daniel 12:2. All who have died in the faith of the third angel\92s message come forth from the tomb glorified, to hear God\92s covenant of peace with those who have kept His law. \93They also which pierced Him\94 (Revelation 1:7), those that mocked and derided Christ\92s dying agonies, and the most violent opposers of His truth and His people, are raised to behold Him in His glory and to see the honor placed upon the loyal and obedient.
